oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of James Shipp to sister
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to "Dear Sister" tells of Shipp's location about 200 miles from Camp Cheatham in East Tennessee. He is feeling "well and harty," and the regiment is on its way to Virginia. He advises her to direct letters to Camp Bradford and "say James Shipp the Eleventh Regiment of Tennessee Capt Weems company." He was referring to Capt. Philip Van Horn Weems who commanded Co. I, 11th Tenn. Inf. Regt., C.S.A. (See hick005 for another Weems item.)
